author: T. Masinter
comment: I'm updating my review because I am now able to change all the color on the watch face and they show up on my Moto 360. Everything is working great except Logo Label is no longer showing any text, not even the default message. It's just a blank bar. Since this feature is not very important to me I have just turned the Logo Label off in the settings. I'm enjoying the watch face very much.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up T.... ill be working on it :) Thanks for the feedback's!

author: Jeb Johnston
comment: Love it like all your other ones, but I noticed that the digital clock text is smaller than it should be on the LG Urbane 2 LTE. I suspected this with NAVI, but it is very obvious on this watch face. I have tried tweaking the font settings, but that only affects the card text. I hope that something can be done. I am looking forward to showing this off at the 3rd annual Time Lord Party, lol

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jeb... When i update this one, and on my next watch face, i will definitively add a font size setting. You're right. Stay around while i work on this. I'll go as fast as i can :)

title: LG Urbane 2 LTE

comment: I was unable to open the app on my Samsung Note 8 and use the application. I would like a refund

author: Michael Rák
comment: This is an epic looking version of REMARKABLE! I've pretty much decided that you are incapable of making a poor quality product. Excellent work!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Haha! Michael you're killing me :)

title: Excellent

comment: I own a few of Tha Phlash's watch faces and several other premium watch faces Hands down his are the best and most dynamic looking. They take a smart watch and make it a classic yet contemporary time piece. Doc Brown would be proud Homie.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jesse, thanks for this great support, totally appreciated!

title: Yet another homerun!

author: David Dodge
comment: The time circuits that rotate on the watch face block the digital time every time one of the bars crosses in front of the time, making it impossible to read.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up David... yeah i was going for a realistic look on this one... ill look into it when the update time come around ok... dont desperate  :) Thanks for taking the time to comment!

title: One flaw...

author: Mark Ingram
comment: I can't get a day out of it, it eats the battery :( LG urbane/G4

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Mark... its work in progress. Maybe a re-install could help the face in case it hasn't installed properly. Also i have a few tips here: http://www.tha-icon.com/help/hows-battery-consumption/ Thx for taking the time to leave a feedback!

title: Fantastic but.......

author: David Blumberg
comment: Can't download to note 8, and nothing shows up on gear. tried uninstall and re-download. Want a refund :(

author: Jaime Andrade
comment: It would be so much cooler if it actually did something , like the electricity actually moved .

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jaime, my hopes is that one day i'll have the knowledge to do that... come back to the past (this present) fix that up. Thanks for this review, although you will not remember this conversation.

title: Capacitor

author: Ruben Kan
comment: I like this watch face. But I don't get it. How come the flux capacitor is running sometimes but sometimes it isn't?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ruben, thx for the love...i think its because your auto day/night time is set to automatic... just go untick that switch in the watchface settings tru the androidWear app on your phone.

author: Chad Ballard
comment: Meh 😊 I liked it but it would not function correctly. I know its not constructive. Colors and dials did not change for me. Other then that great! I have your other watch's and love em. Thanks for the reply.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chad... ok i think its because when you switched from Day to Night mode... you used the settings directly on the watch. I recommend you try to change it from the androidwear phone app. the watch settings can be adjusted there and sometimes responds better. Thanks for the feedback! :)

author: Jason Leavey
comment: Amazing! I'm having trouble getting the "Enable Sweep" function to disable on my Moto 360 (1st gen). Otherwise, it's pretty great!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jason, thanks for the comment and support, and try to change the settings from the phone app instead of directly on the watch maybe you'll have better luck.

author: David Laurell
comment: Really don't want the display to use colors in ambient mode! I also want the capacitor to show some animations like fluxing or something :)

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up David... i have been asking around to get help  on making this flux, animation seems tricky to have but im not giving up. Thanks for the feedback!
